attributes.action: Speed up the ballot for our new Prime Minister
attributes.background: On 7 July Conservative MPs chose two candidates for a new Prime Minister. But party members are not due to make a final decision until 9 September. Delay leaves the country rudderless, despite real-life harm to jobs & security. We believe a new Prime Minister should be elected by the end of July.

rejection.details: The election of the leader of a political party is a matter for the party concerned, not for the Government or Parliament.
